mapper.insert: insert into schedule values(seq_scheduleNo.nextVal, #{ptNo}, #{state}, '', to_date(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') , to_date(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') + #{amount}/(24*60))
mapper.select: select u.userId as userId, u.name as userName, s.scheduleNo as scheduleNo, s.ptNo as ptNo, s.memo as memo, s.state as state, to_char(s.startTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as startTime, to_char(s.endTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as endTime, round((s.endtime - s.startTime) * 1440) as amount from schedule s, pt p, users u where p.ptNo = s.ptNo and p.trainerNo = #{trainerNo} and p.userno = u.userno

select u.userId as userId, u.name as userName, s.scheduleNo as scheduleNo, s.ptNo as ptNo, s.memo as memo, s.state as state, to_char(s.startTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as startTime, to_char(s.endTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as endTime, round((s.endtime - s.startTime) * 1440) as amount from schedule s, pt p, users u where p.ptNo = s.ptNo and p.trainerNo = #{trainerNo} and p.userno = u.userno and s.scheduleNo = #{scheduleNo}

SELECT COUNT(p.ptNo) FROM pt p LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ptNo, COUNT(scheduleNo) scheduleCount FROM schedule GROUP BY ptNo) c ON p.ptNo = c.ptNo WHERE p.trainerNo = #{trainerNo} AND p.endDate >= SYSDATE AND p.regCount >= c.scheduleCount
SELECT ROUND(AVG(NVL(r.score, 0)),1) avgScore, count(r.reviewNo) reviewCount FROM review r left outer join pt p ON p.ptNo = r.ptno WHERE trainerNo = #{trainerNo} AND r.order_no = 1

SELECT u.name userName, info.startTime startTime, info.endtime endtime FROM users u RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT p.userNo, TO_CHAR(s.startTime, 'AM hh:mi', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=ENGLISH') startTime, TO_CHAR(s.endtime, 'hh:mi') endtime FROM schedule s LEFT OUTER JOIN pt p ON s.ptno = p.ptno WHERE TO_CHAR(s.startTime, 'yy/mm/dd') = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd') AND p.trainerNo = #{trainerNo}) info ON u.userNo = info.userNo
